attributes.action: Initiate an open investigation into Israeli war crimes, in particular, genocide and the obstruction and attacks on the UN and relief workers perpetrated by Israel and its agents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under Articles 8, 146 and 147 of the Fourth Geneva Convention, all countries are legally entitled to launch an investigation into the crimes committed by Israel in Gaza because Israel has jeopardized peace and committed genocide. The IDF has repeatedly attacked the UN, and deliverately prevented aid from being provided to adults and children alike. Parties to the convention are obliged to initiate an investigation at the request of any party to the conflict. Part 2 of the convention stipulates respect for innocents, which Israel is in particular Breach of, in addition to the Grave crimes as defined by the convention.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
